mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.price,ec.cover, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.title AS oneSubject, es2.title AS twoSubject, ecd.description FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 on es1.id=ec.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on es2.id=ec.subject_id WHERE ec.id = #{couresId}

SELECT ec.title AS title,ec.price AS price, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.cover AS cover, ec.buy_count AS buyCount, ec.view_count AS viewCount,ecd.description AS description , et.id AS teacherId,et.`name` AS teacherName, et.career AS intro, et.avatar AS avatar , es1.id AS subjectLevelOneId, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId,es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo
FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ecd.id = ec.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
